definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_respawn</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_variable"><field name="variable">onDeathReset</field><field name="config">CUSTOM:MainConfigFile</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:Level</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:currentXpTLevel</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:nextevelXp</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="call_procedure"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">OnPlayerSpawn</field></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
